00057 int
00058 comm_init (int soc)
00059 {
00060   char buf[1024];
00061   int n;
00062 
00063   /* We must read the version of the OTP the client
00064      wants us to use */
00065   n = recv_line (soc, buf, sizeof (buf) - 1);
00066   if (n <= 0)
00067     {
00068       log_write ("Failed reading client-requested OTP version.\n");
00069       return -1;
00070     }
00071 
00072   buf[sizeof (buf) - 1] = '\0';
00073   if (strncmp (buf, "< OTP/2.0 >", 11))
00074     {
00075       log_write ("Unknown client-requested OTP version: %s.\n", buf);
00076       return -1;
00077     }
00078   nsend (soc, "< OTP/2.0 >\n", 12, 0);
00079   return 0;
00080 }
00081 
00089 int
00090 comm_loading (int soc)
00091 {
00092   int n;
00093   size_t len;
00094   char buf[256];
00095   n = recv_line (soc, buf, sizeof (buf) - 1);
00096   if (n <= 0)
00097     {
00098       log_write ("Failed reading client input.\n");
00099       return -1;
00100     }
00101   /* Always respond with SCANNER_LOADING. */
00102   g_snprintf (buf, sizeof (buf), "SCANNER_LOADING <|> %d <|> %d\n",
00103               current_loading_plugins (), total_loading_plugins ());
00104   len = strlen (buf);
00105   n = nsend (soc, buf, len, 0);
00106   if (n != len)
00107     return -1;
00108   while (n > 0)
00109     n = recv_line (soc, buf, sizeof (buf) - 1);
00110 
00111   return 0;
00112 }

00117 void
00118 comm_terminate (struct arglist *globals)
00119 {
00120   auth_printf (globals, "SERVER <|> BYE <|> BYE <|> SERVER\n");
00121 }

00126 void
00127 send_plug_info (struct arglist *globals, struct arglist *plugins)
00128 {
00129   int j;
00130   static const char *categories[] = { ACT_STRING_LIST_ALL };
00131 #define CAT_MAX (sizeof(categories) / sizeof(categories[0]))
00132   const char *name, *copyright, *summary, *version, *family = NULL;
00133   char *str;
00134   int ignored = 0;
00135   char *oid = (char *)arg_get_value (plugins->value, "OID");
00136   nvticache_t *nvticache = (nvticache_t *)arg_get_value (
00137     arg_get_value (plugins->value, "preferences"), "nvticache");
00138   nvti_t *nvti = (oid == NULL ? NULL : nvticache_get_by_oid (nvticache, oid));
00139 
00140   if (!nvti_oid (nvti))
00141     {
00142       log_write ("NVT without OID found. Will not be sent.\n");
00143       nvti_free (nvti);
00144       return;
00145     }
00146 
00147   j = nvti_category (nvti);
00148   if (j >= CAT_MAX || j < ACT_FIRST)
00149     j = CAT_MAX - 1;
00150 
00151   version = nvti_version (nvti);
00152   if (!version)
00153     version = "?";
00154 
00155   if ((name = nvti_name (nvti)) == NULL)
00156     {
00157       log_write ("Inconsistent data (no name): %s - not applying this plugin\n",
00158                  nvti_oid (nvti));
00159       name = "Unknown NAME";
00160       ignored = 1;
00161     }
00162 
00163   if ((copyright = nvti_copyright (nvti)) == NULL)
00164     {
00165       log_write
00166         ("Inconsistent data (no copyright): %s - not applying this plugin\n",
00167          name ? name : nvti_oid (nvti));
00168       copyright = "Unknown COPYRIGHT";
00169       ignored = 1;
00170     }
00171 
00172   if (nvti_tag (nvti) && strstr (nvti_tag (nvti), "summary="))
00173     summary = "NOSUMMARY";
00174   else
00175     summary = nvti_summary (nvti);
00176   if (summary == NULL)
00177     {
00178       log_write
00179         ("Inconsistent data (no summary): %s - not applying this plugin\n",
00180          name ? name : nvti_oid (nvti));
00181       summary = "Unknown SUMMARY";
00182       ignored = 1;
00183     }
00184 
00185   if ((family = nvti_family (nvti)) == NULL)
00186     {
00187       log_write
00188         ("Inconsistent data (no family): %s - not applying this plugin\n",
00189          name ? name : nvti_oid (nvti));
00190       family = "Unknown FAMILY";
00191       ignored = 1;
00192     }
00193 
00194 
00195   if (strchr (name, '\n') != NULL)
00196     {
00197       log_write ("%s: Newline in name\n", nvti_oid (nvti));
00198       ignored = 1;
00199     }
00200 
00201   if (strchr (copyright, '\n') != NULL)
00202     {
00203       log_write ("%s: Newline in copyright\n", nvti_oid (nvti));
00204       ignored = 1;
00205     }
00206 
00207   if (strchr (summary, '\n'))
00208     {
00209       log_write ("%s: Newline in summary\n", nvti_oid (nvti));
00210       ignored = 1;
00211     }
00212 
00213   if (!ignored)
00214     {
00215       char *cve_id, *bid, *xref, *tag;
00216       unsigned int mem_size;
00217 
00218       cve_id = nvti_cve (nvti);
00219       if (cve_id == NULL || strcmp (cve_id, "") == 0)
00220         cve_id = "NOCVE";
00221 
00222       bid = nvti_bid (nvti);
00223       if (bid == NULL || strcmp (bid, "") == 0)
00224         bid = "NOBID";
00225 
00226       xref = nvti_xref (nvti);
00227       if (xref == NULL || strcmp (xref, "") == 0)
00228         xref = "NOXREF";
00229 
00230       {
00231         char *index;
00232         tag = estrdup (nvti_tag (nvti));
00233         index = tag;
00234         if (tag == NULL || strcmp (tag, "") == 0)
00235           tag = "NOTAG";
00236         else
00237           while (*index)
00238             {
00239               if (*index == '\n')
00240                 *index = ';';
00241               index++;
00242             }
00243       }
00244 
00245       mem_size = strlen (name) +
00246         strlen (copyright) +
00247         strlen (summary) +
00248         strlen (family) +
00249         strlen (version) +
00250         strlen (cve_id) +
00251         strlen (bid) +
00252         strlen (xref) +
00253         strlen (tag) +
00254         100;                    /* Separators etc. */
00255 
00256       str = emalloc (mem_size);
00257       snprintf (str, mem_size,
00258                 "%s <|> %s <|> %s <|> "
00259                 "%s <|> %s <|> %s <|> "
00260                 "%s <|> %s <|> %s <|> %s <|> %s",
00261                 nvti_oid (nvti), name, categories[j],
00262                 copyright, summary, family,
00263                 version, cve_id, bid, xref, tag);
00264 
00265       if (tag != NULL && strcmp (tag, "NOTAG"))
00266         efree (&tag);
00267       auth_printf (globals, "%s\n", str);
00268       efree (&str);
00269     }
00270 
00271   nvti_free (nvti);
00272 }
00273 
00280 void
00281 plugin_send_infos (struct arglist *globals, char *oid)
00282 {
00283   struct arglist *plugins = arg_get_value (globals, "plugins");
00284 
00285   if (!oid)
00286     return;
00287   if (!plugins)
00288     return;
00289 
00290   while (plugins)
00291     {
00292       struct arglist *args = plugins->value;
00293       if (args && !strcmp (oid, arg_get_value (args, "OID")))
00294         {
00295           send_plug_info (globals, plugins);
00296           return;
00297         }
00298       plugins = plugins->next;
00299     }
00300 }
00301 
00302 
00309 void
00310 comm_send_pluginlist (struct arglist *globals)
00311 {
00312   struct arglist *plugins = arg_get_value (globals, "plugins");
00313 
00314   auth_printf (globals, "SERVER <|> PLUGIN_LIST <|>\n");
00315   while (plugins && plugins->next)
00316     {
00317       send_plug_info (globals, plugins);
00318       plugins = plugins->next;
00319     }
00320   auth_printf (globals, "<|> SERVER\n");
00321 }
00322 
00327 void
00328 comm_send_preferences (struct arglist *globals)
00329 {
00330   struct arglist *prefs = arg_get_value (globals, "preferences");
00331 
00332   /* We have to be backward compatible with the NTP/1.0 */
00333   auth_printf (globals, "SERVER <|> PREFERENCES <|>\n");
00334 
00335   while (prefs && prefs->next)
00336     {
00337       if (prefs->type == ARG_STRING && !is_scanner_only_pref (prefs->name))
00338         auth_printf (globals, "%s <|> %s\n", prefs->name,
00339                      (const char *) prefs->value);
00340       prefs = prefs->next;
00341     }
00342   auth_printf (globals, "<|> SERVER\n");
00343 }
00344 
00345 
00350 void
00351 comm_wait_order (struct arglist *globals)
00352 {
00353   int soc = GPOINTER_TO_SIZE (arg_get_value (globals, "global_socket"));
00354 
00355   for (;;)
00356     {
00357       static char str[2048];
00358       int n;
00359 
00360       n = recv_line (soc, str, sizeof (str) - 1);
00361       if (n < 0)
00362         {
00363           log_write ("Client closed the communication\n");
00364           exit (0);
00365         }
00366       if (str[0] == '\0')
00367         if (!is_client_present (soc))
00368           {
00369             log_write ("Client not present\n");
00370             exit (0);
00371           }
00372 
00373       if (ntp_parse_input (globals, str) == 0)
00374         break;
00375     }
00376 }

00388 static int
00389 qsort_cmp (const void *a, const void *b)
00390 {
00391   struct arglist **plugin_a = (struct arglist **) a;
00392   struct arglist **plugin_b = (struct arglist **) b;
00393 
00394   return (strcmp
00395           (arg_get_value ((*plugin_a)->value, "OID"),
00396            arg_get_value ((*plugin_b)->value, "OID")));
00397 }
00398 
00404 static struct arglist *
00405 _get_plug_by_oid (struct arglist **array, char *oid, int start, int end,
00406                   int rend)
00407 {
00408   int mid;
00409   char *plugin_oid;
00410 
00411   if (start >= rend)
00412     return NULL;
00413 
00414   if (start == end)
00415     {
00416       plugin_oid = arg_get_value (array[start]->value, "OID");
00417       if (strcmp (plugin_oid, oid) == 0)
00418         return array[start];
00419       else
00420         return NULL;
00421     }
00422 
00423   mid = (start + end) / 2;
00424   plugin_oid = arg_get_value (array[mid]->value, "OID");
00425   if (strcmp (plugin_oid, oid) > 0)
00426     return _get_plug_by_oid (array, oid, start, mid, rend);
00427   else if (strcmp (plugin_oid, oid) < 0)
00428     return _get_plug_by_oid (array, oid, mid + 1, end, rend);
00429 
00430   return array[mid];
00431 }
00432 
00436 static struct arglist *
00437 get_plug_by_oid (struct arglist **array, char *oid, int num_plugins)
00438 {
00439   return _get_plug_by_oid (array, oid, 0, num_plugins, num_plugins);
00440 }

00444 
00452 void
00453 comm_setup_plugins (struct arglist *globals, char *list)
00454 {
00455   int num_plugins = 0;
00456   struct arglist *plugins = arg_get_value (globals, "plugins");
00457   struct arglist *p = plugins;
00458   struct arglist **array;
00459   char *t;
00460   char *oid;
00461   int i;
00462   int enable = LAUNCH_DISABLED;
00463 
00464   if (p == NULL)
00465     return;
00466   if (list == NULL)
00467     list = "-1;";
00468 
00469   if (atoi (list) == -1)
00470     enable = LAUNCH_RUN;
00471   /* Disable every plugin */
00472   while (p->next != NULL)
00473     {
00474       num_plugins++;
00475       plug_set_launch (p->value, enable);
00476       p = p->next;
00477     }
00478 
00479   if (num_plugins == 0 || enable != 0)
00480     return;
00481 
00482   /* Store the plugins in an array for quick access */
00483   p = plugins;
00484   i = 0;
00485   array = emalloc (num_plugins * sizeof (struct arglist **));
00486   while (p->next != NULL)
00487     {
00488       array[i++] = p;
00489       p = p->next;
00490     }
00491 
00492   qsort (array, num_plugins, sizeof (struct arglist *), qsort_cmp);
00493 
00494   t = list;
00495   oid = strtok (t, ";");
00496 
00497   /* Read the list provided by the user and enable the plugins accordingly */
00498   while (oid != NULL)
00499     {
00500       p = get_plug_by_oid (array, oid, num_plugins);
00501       if (p != NULL)
00502         plug_set_launch (p->value, LAUNCH_RUN);
00503 #ifdef DEBUG
00504       else
00505         log_write ("PLUGIN ID %s NOT FOUND!!!\n", oid);
00506 #endif
00507       oid = strtok (NULL, ";");
00508     }
00509 
00510   efree (&array);
00511 }

00513 
00521 static int
00522 nvt_feed_version (char *feed_version, int feed_size)
00523 {
00524   FILE *foutput;
00525   gchar *command, *info_file;
00526   info_file = g_build_filename (OPENVAS_NVT_DIR, "plugin_feed_info.inc", NULL);
00527   command = g_strdup_printf ("grep PLUGIN_SET %s | sed -e 's/[^0-9]//g'",
00528                              info_file);
00529 
00530   foutput = popen (command, "r");
00531   if (fgets (feed_version, feed_size, foutput) == NULL)
00532     {
00533       pclose (foutput);
00534       g_free (info_file);
00535       g_free (command);
00536       return 1;
00537     }
00538 
00539   feed_version[strlen (feed_version) - 1] = '\0';
00540   pclose (foutput);
00541   g_free (info_file);
00542   g_free (command);
00543   return 0;
00544 }
00545 
00553 static int
00554 is_valid_feed_version (const char *feed_version)
00555 {
00556   if (feed_version == NULL)
00557     return 0;
00558 
00559   while (*feed_version)
00560     if (!g_ascii_isdigit (*feed_version++))
00561       return 0;
00562   return 1;
00563 }
00564 
00569 void
00570 comm_send_nvt_info (struct arglist *globals)
00571 {
00572   char buf[2048];
00573   gchar *feed_version;
00574   int feed_size = 32;
00575 
00576   feed_version = g_malloc0 (feed_size);
00577   nvt_feed_version (feed_version, feed_size);
00578 
00579   auth_printf (globals, "SERVER <|> NVT_INFO <|> %s <|> SERVER\n",
00580                is_valid_feed_version (feed_version)
00581                 ? feed_version
00582                 : "NOVERSION");
00583 
00584   g_free (feed_version);
00585 
00586   for (;;)
00587     {
00588       bzero (buf, sizeof (buf));
00589       auth_gets (globals, buf, sizeof (buf) - 1);
00590       if (strstr (buf, "COMPLETE_LIST"))
00591         comm_send_pluginlist (globals);
00592       else if (strstr (buf, "PLUGIN_INFO"))
00593         {
00594           char *t = strstr (buf, " <|> ");
00595           char *s;
00596           if (!t)
00597             continue;
00598           t = strstr (t + 5, " <|> ");
00599           if (!t)
00600             continue;
00601           s = t + 5;
00602           t = strchr (s, ' ');
00603           if (!t)
00604             continue;
00605           t[0] = '\0';
00606           plugin_send_infos (globals, s);
00607         }
00608       else
00609         break;
00610     }
00611 }
